source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Realistic Portrait: Paint A Vietnamese Child In Watercolor
items.headline: Unlock your potential! Paint a realistic portrait step by step in Watercolor, no hassle!
objectives_summary: You will feel more comfortable with the watercolor, you will be not afraid to make mistakes and experiments.
You will learn how to use layering to paint a face.
You will figure out hot to control your brush to work on tiny details such as eyes or lips.

items.title: Drawing Nature - Autumn Edition
items.headline: Discover how to draw and illustrate detailed autumn objects and scenes through sketching with pencil and pen & ink
objectives_summary: Drawing detailed autumn objects
Sketching with a pen
Start with learning to draw simple shapes & objects like acorns & chestnuts and eventually move on to complete scenes

items.title: Draw and tile Islamic geometric patterns with Sandy Kurt
items.headline: Learn to construct, outline and tile 8 geometric patterns and designs from around the Islamic world - Islamic geometry
objectives_summary: Construct different Islamic geometric patterns
Tile the patterns to create a larger composition
Combine the patterns in a layout to create an eye-catching zellige design

items.title: Paint this Beginner WATERCOLOR using 5 Advanced techniques
items.headline: Add Dazzle to your Watercolors and take your work from Drab to Fab. Easy to follow videos.
objectives_summary: Paint a watercolor from dark to light with luminous dark shadows, strategic highlights and have no problem placing a subject for best eye appeal.

items.title: How to Make Hanging Art Mobiles
items.headline: Learn how to make kinetic hanging art mobiles
objectives_summary: Students will learn the fundamentals of art sculpture mobile making.
Students will learn about materials and tools used for creative mobile making.
Students will learn how to use mixed media elements, supports and choose connectors for their mobiles.

items.title: Cat in colored pencils on sanded paper
items.headline: monochrome cat portrait
objectives_summary: drawing a monochrome cat portrait with colored pencils on sanded paper

items.title: How to paint my FREE style sea-side watercolor,for beginners

visible_instructors.title: David Walker
visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist based in North Wales and painting Tutor

items.headline: I painted this seaside watercolor,now you can paint along with a professional artist from the UK,step by step lessons.
objectives_summary: Learn how to apply masking fluid.
Learn how to use just 7 colors to make beautiful watercolors.
Learn when to stop and not overdo it.

items.title: Watercolours with Confidence:  Glass and Reflections

visible_instructors.title: Wendy Framst
visible_instructors.name: Wendy
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional artist, illustrator, and watercolour lover

items.headline: How to paint transparent glass and reflections in watercolour
objectives_summary: How to paint transparent glass objects using watercolour
How to use masking fluid to preserve white of the paper, and how to lift paint
How to use thin glazes to gradually build intense colours

items.title: Switzerland Landscape Painting LIVE Tutorial with Big Canvas
items.headline: Acrylic painting course for art lover, beginner level, art collage students and passionate people
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will have learned: Landscape observation and build composition
How to handle only 4 acrylic colors for the BIG landscape
Learn Mix colors and how to apply color on direct canvas

items.title: Cold Process Intermediate Soapmaking 1
items.headline: Layering and Embedding Techniques in Soap
objectives_summary: Learn to create layers in soap
Learn to embed soap
Learn tips and tricks for success

items.title: Canadian Reflections in Watercolour for Beginners
items.headline: Go from a non-painter to a watercolourist with confidence with a little help from Bev!
objectives_summary: Learn the secret recipes of mixing paint to create a new colour
Develop your own personal skills for future paintings
Discover essential techniques to apply to every painting.

items.title: Mix It Up!
items.headline: Creative Ways to Combine Your Art Materials
objectives_summary: In this class we will look at creative ways to combine our art materials to produce captivating and vibrant artwork and to best convey our subjects’ color, texture and lighting.

items.title: You can draw... Christmas!
items.headline: Learn to draw your own Super-cute characters this Christmas! The easiest and most fun way to learn drawing.
objectives_summary: You'll learn the secrets from professional hand-drawn animators to use basic shapes and building blocks to create lovable cute characters
You'll be able to draw your own cute Christmas Penguins, Bears, Santas, Reindeer and more
You'll be able to make hand-made Christmas gift tags, decorations and cards

items.title: Art: Enhance Your Style - Series: 2
items.headline: Discover Ways to Become a Better Artist
objectives_summary: Learn a fresh approach in creating Expressive Abstract Paintings, Mixed Media, Art Journal Projects, and Collages.
Learn how to intertwine all sorts of genres of Art to create wildly different Expressive Art pieces.
Gain insight into some of the Old Master Techniques and Secrets to enhance and expand your knowledge and skill set.

items.title: Draw a Stunning Sunset of Thames Barges using Pastel Pencils
items.headline: Learn to draw this stunning landscape using Pastel Pencils with Colin Bradley. Easy to follow Pastel Pencil Techniques.
objectives_summary: Use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw a Thames Barges Sunset
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques to their own pictures and landscapes

items.title: ABSTRACT PAINTING video course
items.headline: Explore. Learn.Create.
objectives_summary: My lessons will help you to start. No worries if you have never painted before. I show everything step by step, so you have enough time and space to learn how to paint abstract.
